title: ZJU}{'}s {IWSLT} 2021 Speech Translation System
venue: Proceedings of the 18th International Conference on Spoken Language Translation (IWSLT 2021)
abstract: In this paper, we describe Zhejiang Universityâ€™s submission to the IWSLT2021 Multilingual Speech Translation Task. This task focuses on speech translation (ST) research across many non-English source languages. Participants can decide whether to work on constrained systems or unconstrained systems which can using external data. We create both cascaded and end-to-end speech translation constrained systems, using the provided data only. In the cascaded approach, we combine Conformer-based automatic speech recognition (ASR) with the Transformer-based neural machine translation (NMT). Our end-to-end direct speech translation systems use ASR pretrained encoder and multi-task decoders. The submitted systems are ensembled by different cascaded models.
